title: 11th April 2018
subtitle: New features: Payments and Content
body:
## Payments tab
A new tab has been added to the [miner's page](/) that gives you visibility of all payments made, for all found blocks, for all coins.

![](/gin-data/images/1523496543338-payments-tab.png)



* [Info](/info/ "Info") section added to the site, so that we can provide lots of useful content, like this!
